content: [RED TO BLUE] We will continue with our surveillance of Pink. There is an active threat which must be mitigated.
[RED TO WHITE] Our country has no intention of engaging in armed conflict with you. We are only seeking to protect ourselves and our allies from the threats that exist.
Pink is weak. For anyone who wants it, now's your chance.
You are no threat to us at all, do you even know what you're doing? Stay away from Pink.
Let's form an alliance, we are close in ideology.
